com.stabilit.sc.listener
Interface IConnectionListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface IConnectionListener
extends java.util.EventListener

The listener interface for receiving IConnection events. The class that is interested in processing a IConnection event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addIConnectionListener method. When the IConnection event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.

See Also:
ConnectionEvent
